text: Kagawa Prefectural Higashiyama Kaii Setouchi Art Museum () is an art museum in the city of Sakaide where Kaii's grandfather's birthplace. Kagawa Prefectural Higashiyama Kaii Setouchi Art Museum is dedicated to Japanese painting master, Kaii Higashiyama. The museum has 350 works of Kaii Higashiyama that Kaii's wife donated after he died. The museum was designed by famed architect Yoshio Taniguchi and opened in Sakaid, Kagawa Prefecture, Japan, in 2005. Located near the Great Seto Bridge. Great Seto Bridge from the museum ==Access== About 15~20 minutes by bus from Sakaide Station. ==References== ==External links== * Kagawa Prefectural Higashiyama Kaii Setouchi Art Museum Category:Museums in Kagawa Prefecture Category:Museums established in 2005 Category:2005 establishments in Japan
title: Kagawa Prefectural Higashiyama Kaii Setouchi Art Museum
